pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.service

Class MessageServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.service.MessageServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageService

    @Service
public class MessageServiceImpl
extends Object
implements MessageService
    Service class for managing Message objects.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur
